TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit XamlParseException extends System.Xaml.XamlException

summary.span: 當 XAML 讀取器無法將 XAML 讀取器來源的項目處理成 XAML 節點資料流時，所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a XAML reader cannot process elements of the XAML reader source into a XAML node stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對行資訊使用的情況 (例如當 XAML 節點資料流讀取的)，和特定的例外狀況，可以報告的 XAML 節點資料流來源行資訊。For cases where line information is available (such as when the XAML node stream is read by a ), and for certain exception cases, a can report line information from the source of the XAML node stream. 這項資訊會附加至，而且也會包含在和。This information is appended to the , and is also contained in and . 每一個這些成員由實作基底類別。Each of these members is implemented by the base class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 以系統提供的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

param.name: message

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤說明訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified message that describes the error.

Protected Sub New (info As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: info
param.span: 存放序列物件資料的物件。

span.span: The object that holds the serialized object data.

param.name: context
param.span: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

span.span: The contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 使用序列化資料，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 innerException 參數不是 ，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發。

span.span: If the innerException parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
